STP.TXT: Document status will be changed to “Cancelled” and document will not appear in the sales. Do you want to continue ?
Document status will be changed to “Cancelled” and document will not appear in the sales. Do you want to continue ?
This transaction already Closed. Cannot edit this Transaction.

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('This transaction already Closed. Cannot edit this Transaction.')

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT A.DocEntry, A.DocNum, A.ObjType, A.DocDate, A.U_IDU_Kode_PT, A.TrackNo, IIF(A.DocStatus='O','Open',IIF(A.DocStatus='C','Close',IIF(A.DocStatus='D','Draft','Revisi'))) 'DocStatus', A.CreateTran, A.DocTotal, A.FoCFrghtSC, A.FoCFrghtFC, A.Canceled, trim(REPLACE(A.Comments,char(13),' ')) as 'Comments', A.Ref2, A.UserSign, A.CreateDate, A.CreateTS, A.UserSign2, A.UpdateDate, A.UpdateTS, IIF(A.SummryType='S','Stock Adjustment','Cost Adjustment') 'SummryType' FROM OADJ A WITH (NOLOCK) where (A.DocStatus = ':1' or ':1' is null or ':1' = '') and (A.DocDate between ':2' and ':3') and ISNULL(A.TrackNo,'') like '%'+ISNULL(':5','')+'%' and (A.Ref2 = ':6' or ':6' is null or ':6' = '') and A.DocNum like '%'+':7'+'%' :4 :8 order by A.docentry desc
